name: Rope & Ball
description:
Rope & Ball is a simple arcade game that will put to test your hability through short levels with the same objective, take the ball to the goal. In order to move the ball you throw ropes from certain anchor points and these pull the ball.

Levels are divided in groups, having echa group's first level as a checkpoint. Try to pass every level without letting the ball fall out of the screen or you'll lose and you'll need to go back to last checkpoint.

Manage to overcome levels doing the least amount possible of rope trhowings and unlock amazing balls.
